newsitem.title: USA: Allstate completes reinsurance unit sale.
newsitem.headline: Allstate completes reinsurance unit sale.

text.p: Allstate Insurance Co said Tuesday it completed the sale of its London-based reinsurance operation, Allstate Reinsurance Co Ltd, to QBE Insurance Group Ltd of Sydney, Australia.
Terms of the transaction, first announced in September, were not disclosed.

Allstate Reinsurance, with 1995 net written premiums of $92 million, was indirectly owned by Allstate Insurance, and reinsures risks mainly in the United Kingdom, continental Europe and the Middle East and Far East.
Allstate provides insurance for more than 20 million customers.
